alert.note: Alert for East Becker; East Otter Tail; Grant; Wadena; West Becker; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 3:31AM CST until March 06 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Falling snow could significantly reduce the visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; East Otter Tail; Grant; Wadena; West Becker; West Otter Tail
